item.title: STUDY: Areas With More Fast Food Restaurants Report More Heart Attacks...
item.description:
www.studyfinds.org
A new study out of Australia shows a connection between the number of fast food restaurants in a town or city and the number of people who suffer from heart attacks.

www.mediaite.com
President Donald Trump weighed in on "Fredo-gate" Tuesday morning, calling out Chris Cuomo after a video of the CNN anchor getting after it with some heckling jerk at a Shelter Island bar. A

item.title: Facial recognition mistook 1 in 5 California lawmakers for criminals...
item.description:
www.latimes.com
Roughly 20% of legislators were erroneously matched to a person arrested when the ACLU used face-scanning software to screen their pictures against a criminal database.

item.title: Tarantino defends depicting Bruce Lee as 'arrogant a**hole' in new film...
NOT FUNNY: Andy Dick sucker-punched after performance...
item.description:
www.fox8live.com
A representative for Andy Dick says the controversial comedian was sucker punched, knocked unconscious and put in the ICU after a performance in the French Quarter early Saturday (Aug. 10).

item.title: Rates deepen plunge...
item.description:
www.cnbc.com
The yield on the 10-year Treasury note threatened to break below that of the 2-year while the 30-year bond rate neared an all-time low.

item.title: Recession fears rise...
item.description:
www.cnbc.com
This is the most bullish outlook on fixed income since November 2008, as lower yields mean higher prices and capital appreciation for bondholders
